details.name: Material
details.value: Red cedar wooden frame & floor, tempered glass, ABS.

details.name: Function
details.value:
Temperature/Time setting, Top color changing light,9-12KW steam generator.

Top ceiling is in combined style

details.name: Others
details.value:
1.The material of wooden frame & floor is optional.
2.The acrylic can be Chinese acrylic or Imported acrylic.
3.Domestic steam generator can upgrade to Imported Harvia 10.8KW steam generator.
